name: FlatterMe
0:
”Alexa ask Flatter Me”
”Alexa open Flatter Me”
”Yes”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flatter me
des: If you are feeling a little down, looking for something to cheer you up, say "ask/open flatter-me", to your Alexa Echo. Or maybe you're in need of a little laugh, ask Alexa by saying "Alexa open Flatter me", you will cracked up by the slightly over-the-top flattery. Whatever the case, if you're in the mood for some smooth flattery, the flatter-me skill should do the trick.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
